Gongnong district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: The Dianchi Lake plays an important role in the industrial and agricultural production of Kunming Metropolitan and the everyday life of the people.
sentences.chinese: 滇池在昆明地區工農業生產和民人生活中起重要作用。

sentences.english: Modern industrial and agricultural production must rely on it.
sentences.chinese: 現代的工農業生產要靠電。

sentences.english: The contradiction between flood control and profit is getting increasingly serious as industry and agriculture develop.
sentences.chinese: 隨着工農業的發展，水庫防洪與興利矛盾日益突出。

sentences.english: The Red Army men once wrote down their heroic feat here.
sentences.chinese: 中國工農紅軍也曾在這裏的雪山草地裏書寫壯舉。

sentences.english: When the Worker-Peasant-Soldier Student graduated, a lot of them were assigned to the original units or provinces where they had worked in.
sentences.chinese: 工農兵學員畢業後，多被分配到原單位或原省份工作。

sentences.english: The total value of industrial and agricultural output this year increased by seven percent over last.
sentences.chinese: 今年的工農業生產部值比去年的上升了百分之七。

sentences.english: Industrial production and agriculture exceeded pre-World War II levels.
sentences.chinese: 工農業生產超過了二次世界大戰前的水平。

sentences.english: Create new units of the Red Army from among the masses of militant workers and peasants.
sentences.chinese: 鬥爭的工農羣衆中創造出新的紅軍部隊。

sentences.english: Marxism- Leninism stands precisely for alliance and co-operation between workers and peasants.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義就是講工農聯盟，工農合作。

sentences.english: Marxism- Leninism stands precisely for alliance and co-operation between workers and peasants.

sentences.english: In the fInal analysis, the strength In russia was on the side of the Soviets of Workers, Peasants and Soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 歸根結蒂，俄國的力量是在工農兵蘇維埃這方面。

sentences.english: Water pollution is one of problems Puzzling the development of industry and agriculture in Haiyin.
sentences.chinese: 水污染是困擾淮陰區工農業發展的問題之一。

sentences.english: We are sons of workers and peasants.
Dnieper north-south central part of the shipping lines and major industrial and agricultural water.

sentences.english: Workers, peasants and soldiers march forward bravely. The Great Revolution surges high.
sentences.chinese: 工農兵奮勇前進，大革命洶湧澎湃。

sentences.english: These products can be widely used in the fields of the industrial and agricultural wrappage, and table-ware used once only etc.
sentences.chinese: 能廣泛應用於工農業包裝，一次性餐飲具等領域。

definition: the New Culture Movement (mid-1910s and 1920s), intellectual revolution against Confucianism aiming to introduce Western elements, especially democracy and science
Chen Yun (1905-1995), communist leader and economist
Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee
Red Army (1928-1937), predecessor of the PLA/(Soviet) Red Army (1917-1946)
War of Liberation (1945-49), after which the Communists 共產黨武裝|共产党武装 under Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 took over from the Nationalists 國民政府|国民政府 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石

Peng Dehuai (1898-1974), top communist general, subsequently politician and politburo member, disgraced after attacking Mao's failed policies in 1959, and died after extensive persecution during the Cultural Revolution
